title: Who do you think the weakest assassin is!? ~ Poll A-K
body:
Who do you think is the weakest? I want to know.

Vote as a community.

Champions 10/30 

Continue though the vote list via these links:
L-R: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/A8MwRmaT-who-do-you-think-the-weakest-assassin-is-poll-l-s
_____
S-Z: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/vWzHphye-who-do-you-think-the-weakest-assassin-is-poll-s-z

replies.body:
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Category:Assassin_champion

sorry for any 'inconvenience' but I just used a wiki list, I know they can be pretty in accurate, but I was in a rush.
Wtf is these lists anyway, Ahri, Fiora, Irelia and Jax are not assassins.

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=onQ34IuY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-05T04:00:21.535+0000)
>
> Wtf is these lists anyway, Ahri, Fiora, Irelia and Jax are not assassins.

He probably included secondary:Assassins as well

> [{quoted}](name=proMINscuous,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=onQ34IuY,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-05T04:03:10.339+0000)
>
> He probably included secondary:Assassins as well

That's a joke in itself.

Well Ahri is an ex assassin, Fiora can be played as an assassin.

Irelia and Jax though.

they were considered assassins in S2 - Jax
and irelia was in S3.

+ couldn't be bothered to sift

best new champ NA ;) 


it was typo.
hahahahah oh well, he made one mistake...
